name: Trans'2: Boku to Atashi to Koibito to
summary: Trans'2: Boku to Atashi to Koibito to is a cross-gender feminine-expression themed eroge developed by Catear. Protagonist Shinobu is introduced to the world of cross-gender expression by childhood friend Mizuki. The game includes both ADV-style visual novel sections and "dress-up" sections where players are able to choose how Shinobu goes out into the city.
